pullRequest.title: Site: Add Tencent and TBDS logo in powered-by image
pullRequest.bodyText: Update the powered-by image, add Tencent and TBDS logo on it.

nodes.bodyText: The paragraph is too long. We'd better simplify it and focus on technique part.
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -137,3 +137,7 @@ It uses Calcite to transparently rewrite queries to use materialized views. is a SQL interface to a Apache TinkerPop-enabled graph database. + +### TBDS + +[TBDS](https://cloud.tencent.com/product/tbds) (Tencent Big Data Suite) is a reliable, safe, and easy-to-use big data processing platform based on Tencent's years of massive data processing experience. With the help of TBDS, you can choose a suitable big data analysis engine and corresponding real-time data development, offline data development, and algorithm development services to build your data warehouse in public, private, and non-cloud environments. Big data application services such as user portraits, precise recommendations, and risk management.

nodes.bodyText: How about ".... is a platform for big data storage and processing. It uses calcite for query analysis."?
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -137,3 +137,7 @@ It uses Calcite to transparently rewrite queries to use materialized views. is a SQL interface to a Apache TinkerPop-enabled graph database. + +### TBDS + +[TBDS](https://cloud.tencent.com/product/tbds) (Tencent Big Data Suite) is Big data computing and analysis platform, it uses calcite for query analysis.

commit.message: Site: Add Tencent and TBDS logo in powered-by image
